resources.string:
HOW TO USE THIS APP: 
 
 MAP: total number of cases grouped by province 
 (South Africa total is included) 
 
 Tap on a province to select which is shown in CURVE 
 
 CURVE: shows the increase in detected cases, for the selected province. 
 
 Tap on curve to go back to map 
 
 SPREAD simulation is meant to show how hard it is to avoid getting infected 
 So wear your mask and get vaccinated. 
 
 Statistics on the MAP are from the University of Pretoria. 
 Currently stats are updated daily. 
 
 Stay safe!
